title: Duellist's Prerogative
content:
ype unlocks: A blade gifted to Lora by her own mother, Lenore the Fleet. When challenged to duels, Lenoreâ€˜s opponents assumed she had received this nickname from some naval exploit. They found out how wrong they were when her blade blurredfaster than the eye could follow. Rapier Finesse 0.9 1300

Duellist's Prerogative

1d8+3Piercing+ 1d4 Necrotic

Weapon Enchantment +3

Main Hand OnlyElegant Duellist: While your off-hand is empty, you score a Critical Hit when rolling a 19. Moreover, you gain a
